item.title: Docs: KiCad Template Project
item.description:
Overview

The Leafony template project for KiCad makes leaf board design a breeze.
The template project is configured with the following items

  • 2cm x 2cm Leaf outline
  • Leafony bus footprint
  • Design Rules.

Download

You can download the template project from the link below.

GitHub - Leafony/cad-template

Development environment

  • KiCad 5.0.0 or later

Usage

Create a new project

  1. Launch KiCad.
  2. File -> New -> Project -> Create Project from Template.
  3. Select the User Templates tab.
  4. See the following path from the template project downloaded under the template path.
\cad-template-master\KiCad\Leafony_Template
  1. Select Leafony Leaf and click OK.

  1. Enter a project name and save the project to any location.

Back to previous page

item.title: Docs: CR-8000 Design Force Template Design Data
item.description:
Overview

The Leafony template design data for the CR-8000 Design Force makes leaf board design easy. The template design data contains the following items.

  • 2cm x 2cm Leaf outline
  • Leafony bus footprint
  • Other Parts Footprint
  • Design rule

Download

You can download the template design data from the link below.

GitHub - Leafony/cad-template

Development Environment

  • CR-8000 Design Force 2020 or later

Usage

  1. Start the CR-8000 Design Force.
  2. File -> Open -> Design Data.
  3. Select the template design data you downloaded and click Open.

Back to previous page
